reviewText: Another great Korean detective movie (why can't Hollywood make movies like this?), well timed suspense, great acting and a beautiful actress leading us to surprising things amidst her grief and one-minded resolve to set things right!
Korean movies have always excited me, the twist and turns are non stop. It's in my top 10 movies.

MY HUSBAND REALLY LIKES ASIAN MOVIES,WHERE I HAVE MORE TIME TO DO OTHER THINGS MORE OMPORTANT! HOWEVER, I WAS SITTING WATCHING MONTAGE & IT WAS A VERY GOOD MOVIE.IT WAS VERY EASY TO FOLLOW,IT PULLED ME INTO IT ,KEPT  ME READING ALL THE LINES PLUS IT HAS CAUSED ME TO RETHINK MY MY SCHEDULE TO BE FREE AT LEAST A FEW OF THE MOVIES MY HUSBAND ENJOYS SO MUCH! A GREAT FIND!
